title: Beach Holidays
part1: Have a good time, relax and unwind. Lie down in a deckchair by the beach, sipping a good cocktail or even on the sand, with your feet in the water.
part2: We will list, on our articles, the countries where you can take a break from the hustle and bustle of city life.
google-description: A well-deserved rest. Stretch out on a deckchair and enjoy a moment all by yourself by the beach. Relax and unwind while sipping a good cocktail. Discover the countries where you can take a break from the hustle and bustle of city life through our articles.
